name: Resources, Targets and Pricing
description: There is an economic inefficiency coming from one dimensional transaction fee mechanism. To come up with more efficient multidimensional fee mechanism, we first list and define main resources used by (rollup) chains for handling user transactions. We discuss different target goals with each resource, combining them into constrained optimization problem.

speakers.name: Akaki Mamageishvili
speakers.bio: Master and Ph.D. in theoretical computer science from ETH Zurich. Postdoc and senior researcher in microeconomics, at ETH Zurich, mostly focusing on voting and governance questions. Research scientist at Offchain Labs, working on rollup optimization and economic issues.
